title: Models! Models! Models!
text:
Software information and conventions
I used the knitr package [@xie2015] and the bookdown package [@R-bookdown] to compile my book. My R session information is shown below:

xfun::session_info()

Platform: aarch64-apple-darwin20 (64-bit)
Running under: macOS Big Sur 11.7.6

Locale: en_US.UTF-8 / en_US.UTF-8 / en_US.UTF-8 / C / en_US.UTF-8 / en_US.UTF-8

title: 2  Introduction
text:
Now unplug your Internet cable, and start doing some serious work.
We have a nice figure in Figure @ref(fig:hello), and also a table in Table @ref(tab:iris).

par(mar = c(4, 4, 1, .1))
plot(cars, pch = 19)
